name: Oleg Domanov
summary: Shopify Developer with a strong background in designing, customizing, and launching 5+ Shopify and Shopify Plus stores. Experienced with Online Store 2.0, Dawn theme customization, and building interactive, high-performing UIs using React and Next.js. Passionate about creating conversion-optimized e-commerce experiences and delivering clean, maintainable code.

experience.title: Shopify Developer
experience.summary: Shopify Developer with a strong background in designing, customizing, and launching 5+ Shopify and Shopify Plus stores. Experienced with Online Store 2.0, Dawn theme customization, and building interactive, high-performing UIs using React and Next.js. Passionate about creating conversion-optimized e-commerce experiences and delivering clean, maintainable code.
highlights: Strong skills in Shopify, Liquid, React, Next.js, Node.js, JavaScript, TypeScript, and modern web technologies.
Experience in building and optimizing Shopify stores and e-commerce solutions.
Experience in building and optimizing Shopify stores and e-commerce solutions.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.summary: Frontend Developer specializing in React and Next.js, experienced in creating reusable components, optimizing performance, and translating UI/UX designs into high-quality interfaces. Worked across multiple client projects, integrating APIs and implementing mobile-first layouts. Developed basic skills in Shopify theme updates and Online Store 2.0 customizations.
highlights: Developed responsive user interfaces using React, Next.js, and TypeScript to support various client projects.
Built reusable components and implemented modern frontend patterns to improve code quality and maintainability.
Collaborated with designers to convert Figma and Adobe XD mockups into pixel-perfect, production-ready interfaces.
Worked with RESTful APIs to fetch, manage, and display dynamic data across different pages and dashboards.
Improved frontend performance through optimized rendering, code splitting, and efficient state management.
Implemented UI layouts using TailwindCSS, Bootstrap, and custom CSS for mobile-first designs.
Contributed to e-commerce and marketing-related projects, occasionally assisting with Shopify theme adjustments and basic customizations.

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.summary: Began my career mastering HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, building responsive and accessible user interfaces. Focused on clean structure, reusable components, and creating layouts that worked across all devices and browsers. Developed strong UI/UX fundamentals and attention to design precision while learning backend technologies.
highlights: Developed fully responsive layouts using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
Implemented pixel-perfect designs and optimized pages for performance.
Focused on accessibility, semantic markup, and clean code structure.
Collaborated with designers to translate mockups into live interfaces.
Gained strong understanding of frontend fundamentals and design principles.
